wheel.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: one of the round things under a car, bus, bicycle etc that turns when it moves
wheel.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The car slid sideways, its rear wheels spinning.
wheel.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the round piece of equipment that you turn to make a car, ship etc move in a particular direction
wheel.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Shall I take the wheel (=drive instead of someone else)?
The driver must have fallen asleep at the wheel.
wheel.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a flat round part in a machine that turns round when the machine operates
wheel.translation[0].note_box[0].section: Turn your front wheels in the direction of the skid.
The rear wheels of the bus got stuck in a creek.
The rear wheels spun in the sand.
wheel.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to push something that has wheels somewhere
wheel.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Kate wheeled her bike into the garage.
wheel.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to move someone or something that is in or on something that has wheels
wheel.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: Two nurses were wheeling him into the operating theatre.
wheel.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: if birds or planes wheel, they fly around in circles
wheel.translation[1].definitions[3].exam: She wheeled around and started yelling at us.
